courses.title: DriveMerge
courses.description: DriveMerge lets you connect multiple Google Drive accounts and use them like a single drive. It helps you manage files easily and overcome storage limits.

courses.title: PrepLoom
courses.description: PrepLoom is a one-stop platform for students to learn, revise, and prepare for interviews. It includes roadmaps, project ideas, resume tips, and more.

courses.title: JEE College Predictor
courses.description: A tool that helps JEE students find suitable colleges based on their rank and preferences. It uses real data and gives quick, personalized results.

courses.title: IMDb Dashboard
courses.description: An interactive IMDb-style dashboard that displays movies, ratings, genres, and other insights in a clean and user-friendly interface.

courses.title: TRIP PLANNER
courses.description: An AI-powered trip planner that helps you create travel plans, discover places, and organize your journey in a simple and fun way.

courses.title: Student Management System
courses.description: A system designed to manage student details, attendance, marks, and academic progress. It also provides an easy-to-use admin dashboard for reports and daily operations.

courses.title: Serenity Springs
courses.description: A wellness platform where users can book therapy sessions. Admins and therapists get tools to handle schedules, users, and sessions smoothly.

courses.title: RapidMERN
courses.description: RapidMERN is a CLI tool that helps developers quickly set up a full MERN stack project with Prisma and MySQL, saving time and effort during initial project setup.

courses.title: LODGING LAND
courses.description: A platform to browse stays easily. Users can explore different lodging options based on their needs.

courses.title: DINE RESTAURANT WEBSITE
courses.description: A simple frontend landing page design for a restaurant. It focuses only on layout, visuals, and UI

courses.title: OrganizePro
courses.slug: A todo list app made with react
courses.description: A simple and clean to-do app built with React that helps you plan tasks, stay organized, and be more productive.

courses.title: REACT QUIZ APP
courses.description: A fun quiz app focused on React questions. It helps users test their knowledge and learn React concepts.

courses.title: 2048-Game
courses.description: A browser-based 2048 game where players combine tiles to reach the final goal. Simple, fun, and addictive.

courses.title: TIC-TAC-TOE-GAME
courses.slug: A simple tic tac toe game interface
courses.description: A classic Tic-Tac-Toe game built for the web. Play with friends and enjoy a simple, clean interface.

courses.title: NST-WEBSITE-CLONE
courses.description: A clone of the NST website that recreates its layout and design while keeping the original feel intact.

courses.title: MEMORY-GAME
courses.description: A card-matching game that tests your memory and focus. Simple to play and fun for all ages.

courses.title: IMAGE-GALLERY
courses.description: An image gallery with a lightbox feature that lets users view photos in a smooth and interactive way.

courses.title: CampusLink
courses.description: A platform that connects juniors with seniors for guidance, mentorship, and campus-related support.

courses.title: JeeBuddy
courses.description: A chatbot made for JEE aspirants that provides instant help, guidance, and useful study resources.

courses.title: LinkedIn-Clone
courses.description: A landing page clone of LinkedIn that matches its look and feel for practice and learning purposes.
